reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very solid wall Mount.
reviews.reviewText: The wall Monzlteck wall mount is a very solid unit. I had trouble finding a wall mount that didn’t use straps to hold the PlayStation 3. This mount is made out of metal and has 4 holes in the back for mounting. I used 75 lbs. Dry wall anchors to install the mount. This mount is very straight forward and easy to install. The PlayStation just slides into the mount and the power cord plugs in through the cut out on the side. If you are looking for a clean way to display and use your PS# this mount, is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds the PS3 slim well and is padded to keep it in place
reviews.reviewText: This wall mount keeps the PS3 slim in place really well and the extra padding is form fitting for the curved PS3. Definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is AWESOME!
reviews.reviewText: If you're trying to get your PS3 off the shelf and on the wall, this bracket is for you! The bracket its self is REALLY solid. I tried to bend it and it had like no flex at all. It comes with instructions and mounting hardware, but I advise anchoring it into a stud; don't just use the supplied sheet rock anchor, or you might not get the results you're looking for... I'm so happy with this one, I'm going to buy another one for my other PS3!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meets expectations, securely fits my PS3...no complaints!
reviews.reviewText: My PS3 is currently sitting on the media stand behind my TV, and it is not as accessible as I would like. I saw this mounting bracket and eagerly placed my order. The package arrived quickly, and they did a wonderful job packing and protecting it from any damage. The stand/mount was placed in a bubble wrap bag, and the screws and drywall anchors were kept together in a small ziplock bag. I was very surprised at the weight of the mount, which seemed a bit excessive, relative to the actual weight of the PS3. Instead of mounting on the wall, though, I decided to just keep it in the mount and utilize it more like a stand, which the weight now plays in my favor. The weight allows the PS3 to stay in a stable and vertical position, and I'm really happy with it. I like how the USB charging cable for the controllers installs in the cut-out port in the stand, as does the power cord, which in the end, makes kind of a lock and key method of keeping the PS3 in the mount/stand; I find this to be an extra bonus! I'm very happy with this mount, even with the repurposing of it like I did. I happily recommend this for other PS3 users. Two thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A sturdy secure wall mount for your ps3 slim
reviews.reviewText: The mount itself is made from a sturdy metal, that isn't too thick, installation is fairly easy, all you need is a bubble level, a pencil, and a driver/drill. I personally opted to using higher quality screws and wall anchors as the default ones manufacturers are obligated to provide with products like this, are generally not good quality.Once installed the PlayStation 3 slim fit in perfectly, not too snug, and not loose at all. My only complaint is the price point (25.99 at the time of reviewing), Personally I think it's somewhat high for what comes down to a piece of metal, some cheap screws, and wall anchors.
Surprisingly difficult to find a quality product for this purpose. Solid design easy to install and looks great. Highly recommend
